diy_mission: This mission seems to be a large scale alliance mission.

name.label: Name
name.description: Shows the name of the mission in the helper.

id.label: ID
id.description: Displays the ID of the mission in the helper.

type.label: TYP-ID
type.description: Displays the ID of the mission type in the helper.

poi.label: POI
poi.description: Indicates in the helper which POI the operation is at.

live_patients.label: Number of patients
live_patients.description: Shows live how many patients are currently in use.

special.label: Other information
special.description: Displays special information, such as the average minimum number of personnel required.

expansions.label: distributions
expansions.description: Shows what the bet can spread to. (Shows only simple spread)

followup.label: Follow-up missions
followup.description: Shows what the insert can generate for follow-up missions

show_100.label: Show 100% probability
show_100.description: Shows the probability for a vehicle even if it is 100%.

lfrw.label: Show if the Heavy Rescue can process the mission
lfrw.description: Displays a message in the Mission whether it can also be processed with a Heavy Rescue instead of a fire truck.

credits.label: Average earnings
credits.description: Shows the average earnings you get for this assignment.

show_siwa.label: Requirements of security guards
show_siwa.description: Shows the requirements for security guards in the helper as well.

show_k9.label: Dog icon behind mission name
show_k9.description: Shows a dog emoji behind the mission name if k9 is required.

mission_time.label: Creation Time
mission_time.description: Shows the date and time when the mission was created.

requirements.heavy_rescue_vehicles: Rescue Support Vehicles or Rescue Pump
requirements.allow_rw_instead_of_lf: Fire engines or Rescue Support Vehicles
requirements.airport_command: Airfield Operations Supervisor | Airfield Operations Supervisors
requirements.airport_equipment: Airfield Operations Vehicle | Airfield Operations Vehicles
requirements.coastal_helicopter: Coastguard Rescue Helicopter | Coastguard Rescue Helicopters
requirements.coastal_mud_rescue: Coastguard Mud Rescue Unit | Coastguard Mud Rescue Units
requirements.elw_airport: Airfield Firefighting Command Vehicle | Airfield Firefighting Command Vehicles
requirements.flood_equipment: Flood Rescue Unit | Flood Rescue Units
requirements.height_rescue_units: Coastguard Rope Rescue Unit | Coastguard Rope Rescue Units
requirements.mud_rescue: Mud Decontamination Unit | Mud Decontamination Units
requirements.oneof_fire_command_advanced_or_airport_f: ICCU or Ambulance Control Units or Airfield Firefighting Command Vehicles
requirements.oneof_fire_command_or_airport_fire_comma: Fire Officers or Airfield Firefighting Command Vehicles
requirements.oneof_fire_engine_or_airport_fire_engine: Fire Engines or Major Foam Tenders
Fire Engines, RIVs or Major Foam Tenders
requirements.oneof_fire_engine_or_rescue: Fire Engines or Rescue Support Vehicles
requirements.oneof_fire_engine_or_rescue_or_ladder: Fire Engines, Rescue Support Vehicles or Aerial Appliance Trucks
requirements.oneof_fire_ladder_or_rescue_stairs: Aerial Appliance Trucks or Rescue Stairs
requirements.oneof_police_patrol_or_swat: Police Cars or Armed Response Vehicles (ARVs)
